Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Order' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'inflow_contents_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_Order ADD inflow_contents_id nvarchar(30) DEFAULT ('') NOT NULL END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_Order' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'inflow_contents_type') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_Order ADD inflow_contents_type nvarchar(20) DEFAULT ('') NOT NULL END GO
